summary: Late one night, in a seedy topless bar, a group of men watch a stripper dance over their malted beverages. But, one of them is an ex-con who's about to put the group on a collision course ... See full summary Â»
cast: Raymond J. Barry|Rustam Branaman|Jennifer MacDonald|Taylor Nichols|David Selby|Paul Williams|April Grace|Biff Yeager|Tom Bresnahan|Deborah De Voto
title: Headless Body in Topless Bar
